citeinfo.title: Rhode Island Geographic Information System (RIGIS) Data Distribution System

descript.abstract: Public fishing or boating access areas owned or maintained by the Rhode Island Department of Environmental Management. Includes boat ramps, small craft launch areas, and shore fishing access areas on Rhode Island fresh and salt water bodies

idinfo.useconst: This dataset is provided 'as is.â€™ The producer(s) of this dataset, contributors to this dataset, the Rhode Island Geographic Information System (RIGIS) consortium, the State of Rhode Island, and the University of Rhode Island do not make any warranties of any kind for this dataset, and are not liable for any loss or damage however and whenever caused by any use of this dataset. Please acknowledge both RIGIS and the primary producer(s) of this dataset in any derived products. Versions of the RIGIS logo suitable for both printed and web-based products are available at http://www.rigis.org/logos.

cntorgp.cntorg: Rhode Island Department of Environmental Management

idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows 7 Version 6.1 (Build 7601) Service Pack 1; ESRI ArcGIS 10.0.4.4000

procstep.procdesc: In 2001, RIDEM Division of Fish & Wildlife staff visited sites to assess overall conditions and suitability of each site for a particular use. A site sketch was made, driving directions from the nearest main road were written and digital photographs were taken. From the field collected information, locations were heads-up digitized in ArcView 3.2 using 1997 1:5000 black and white ortho-photography as a reference. Digitized locations and information were checked by senior staff for accuracy and completeness.

cntorgp.cntorg: Rhode Island Department of Environmental Management

procstep.procdesc: Dataset since maintained by RIDEM Division of Planning and Development. Location and attribute information updated using internal records and aerial photograph interpretation.

cntorgp.cntorg: Rhode Island Department of Environmental Management

procstep.procdesc: Data contributed to RIGIS by the Rhode Island Department of Environmental Management. Metadata were reviewed, minor corrections made to formatting and content, RIGIS distribution information added.

cntorgp.cntorg: University of Rhode Island Environmental Data Center
